name: Feanix Biotechnologies
headline: Farm Genetics Made Easy - Using DNA and Software
description: Feanix is a trailblazing force in the trillion-dollar animal breeding industry. Feanix leverages proprietary genetic testing advancements to provide genetics and breeding as a service.

founders.name: Mitchell Angove, Founder
founders.description: Hi, I am Mitch and I am a Co-Founder of Feanix Biotechnologies. At Feanix we focus on utilizing DNA to create a new generation of efficient and healthy agriculture. I grew up on a farm and have spent a lifetime in agriculture working to make a better future of food. I have a Bachelors in Genetics and a Masters in Animal Science.

founders.name: Tom Bishop, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CSO of Feanix Biotechnologies. Completed a BSc with honors in Biochemistry and PhD in Genetics at the University of Otago in New Zealand. Was a Postdoctoral Scholar in the department of Animal Science at UC Davis for five years. Research highlights include developing a chemical treatment to improve regeneration of non-regenerative tissues, developing a transgene to differentiate between X and Y chromosome sperm, and developing a new method for transgene delivery to avian embryos.

generated_description:
Feanix Biotechnologies is a pioneering startup that was founded in 2022 and is a member of Y Combinator's Batch S23. With a mission encapsulated in their tagline, "Farm Genetics Made Easy - Using DNA and Software," Feanix aims to revolutionize the animal breeding industry, a market worth trillions. They offer genetics and breeding as a service, utilizing cutting-edge genetic testing technologies to simplify and optimize animal breeding.

Headquartered in Asheville, North Carolina, Feanix has a small but dynamic team of five employees, all dedicated to transforming how animal genetics are approached. They specialize in offering genetic testing services for livestock, specifically cattle, and even pigeons, ensuring that breeding decisions are informed by precise DNA insights. 

Their platform allows customers to order tests easily, whether it's for cattle or racing pigeons, and offers comprehensive guidelines on sample collection to facilitate the testing process. For a modest price of $10, clients can initiate genetic testing from just a single hair or feather, making it accessible for breeders at all levels.

For more information, or if you're interested in getting in touch, check out their website at [Feanix Biotechnologies](https://www.feanixbio.com/), where you can also find further details on their services and contact options. With a clear vision and innovative approach, Feanix Biotechnologies is set to make a significant impact on the animal breeding landscape.
